Edges-Werewolf -- Male Human Legendary Werewolf
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d12 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Ferocity: +2 Agility Step/+2 Strength Step/+2 Vigor Step
Skills (30 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Science: (sma) d6
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d8 Stealth: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d6 Psionics: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d8
Healing: (sma) d6 Riding: (agi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Skill Notes: Alpha: Successful Intimidation vs. Spirit controls natural canine creatures until the end of the encounter
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 12; Skill: 18
Features
Edges (8 points): Alpha; Bite & Claws; Regeneration (Fast); Roar; Speech; Toughness +2; Wall Walker; Werewolf Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Werewolf: Has Bite, Claws, Cannot Speak (Werewolf), Ferocity, Infravision, Rage, Regeneration (Slow), Speed, Transformation, and Weakness (Silver) features
Cannot Speak (Werewolf): Cannot speak while transformed
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Speech: May speak haltingly in werewolf form; suffers a -2 penalty on spoken Trait checks
Transformation: May change between normal and werewolf forms at will; must remain a werewolf during the full moon
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 12 (2) Pace/Run: 8/+d8
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Bite (d12+d8 AP 4); Chainsaw (2d6+4); Claws (d12+d8 AP 4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Bite&Claws: Increased Bite and Claw effects
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Speed: +2 Pace/+1 Run Step
Toughness+2: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Infravision: Suffers half normal illumination penalties when attacking warm targets
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers a major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Regeneration (Fast): Successful healing removes incapacitation or restores 1 Wound (Raise 2 Wounds) not caused by silver 1/rd
Regeneration (Slow): May attempt a natural healing roll 1/dy
Roar: May make an Intimidation Test against all targets in a 9" cone
Wall Walker: May move 4" on vertical surfaces and 4" on inverted
Weakness (Silver): Suffers +4 damage from silvered weapons while in werewolf form
